name: theeasiestxdebug
description: The easiest way to control Xdebug
author: Nikita Nikitin

preferences.name: idekey
preferences.title: IDE key for remote debugging
preferences.description: Custom value for XDEBUG_SESSION cookie, the name of your debug session

preferences.name: traceTriggerValue
preferences.title: Trace trigger value
preferences.description: Custom value for XDEBUG_TRACE cookie, that corresponds your xdebug.trace_enable_trigger_value

preferences.name: profileTriggerValue
preferences.title: Profiler trigger value
preferences.description: Custom value for XDEBUG_PROFILE cookie, that corresponds your xdebug.profiler_enable_trigger_value
